Belthassan:
It is a logical move... for you. However, my faction has made no 
enemies yet, and I am convinced that fighting your enemies will bring 
hatred on us. We are not innocent bystanders, but we are neutrals, and 
I intend to stay as long as possible. If you want to try to convince 
me, I am ready to hear your arguments.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Kali::
> 
> Kali opened the com link and said "I'm Kali, Our faction sugesst a 
> reciprocal non-agression deal, plus we can exchange knowledge and 
> help in case that other team try to fight against each team who 
> belong to this deal"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > Belthassan:
> > Interesting... Predacons, I am Commander Belthassan of the 
> > Tripredacus. I would like to get more information on this 
alliance. 
> > Please tell me more.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Kali::
> > > 
> > > Kali send a message following Shivah's command, and send this 
> > message
